messages.content: They're Kane and Gretzka from Bayern Munich.
They are celebrating on the soccer field
He's Thomas Muller from Bayern Munich.
Why is he on the ground?
Because he's sliding on his knees to celebrate.
Chinese astronaut Gui Haichao is giving a speech.

He was appointed to be a payload specialist on Shenzhou 16 mission in June 2022, thus becoming the first Chinese civilian of Group 3 in space on 30 May 2023. He is responsible for the on-orbit operation of space science experimental payloads.
